body_html: Also take into consideration that opening an issue here causes thousands of people to receive notifications. We want them to see an individual communicating an interesting problem, rather than being redirected to Stack Overflow. The TensorFlow team aims to focus on work that benefits the entire community, e.g. fixing bugs and writing features. Support only helps individuals.
